title: Client lagging with new update
body: I just recently downloaded the new update and now my client is lagging. I have a great internet connection. I do recall bugsplat popping up though. Can anyone help me solve this new lag that didn't exist the day before this new update?

replies.body: im having the same issue along with everyone i come across online can you guys please loos into this we cant play normal's till its fixed

When exactly are you getting a bugsplat?  It sounds like there could be an issue with your game data or driver rendering assets, and not necessarily your client.  Were you able to toggle into Low-spec mode on the updated client to troubleshoot?  Let me know.
